Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Irt-ḥr-r-r:w with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed hands in relief holding an incised adze and the string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the foot.
